verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6367>Pihahiroth,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H4024>Migdol<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H6440>over<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H1189>Baalzephon:<s%> <S%H5226>before<s%> it shall you <S%H2583>encamp<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

For <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> They are <S%H943>entangled<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> has <S%H5462>shut<s%> them in.

And I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that he shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; and I will be <S%H3513>honored<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on all his <S%H2428>host;<s%> that the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1272>fled:<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> was <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have we <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> that we have let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> from <S%H5647>serving<s%> us?
And he made <S%H631>ready<s%> his <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> with him:

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H970>chosen<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H7991>captains<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one of them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out with an <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

But the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and his <S%H2428>army,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtook<s%> them <S%H2583>encamping<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H6367>Pihahiroth,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1189>Baalzephon.<s%>

And when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> drew <S%H7126>near,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H5265>marched<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; and they were <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1115>Because<s%> there were <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6913>graves<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> have you <S%H3947>taken<s%> us away to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H2063><s%> have you <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2063>thus<s%> with us, to <S%H3318>carry<s%> us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>

Is not <S%H2088>this<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> that we did <S%H1696>tell<s%> you in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let us <S%H2308>alone,<s%> that we may <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians?<s%> For it had been <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> than that we should <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> you not, <S%H3320>stand<s%> still, and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he will <S%H6213>show<s%> to you to <S%H3117>day:<s%> for the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> to <S%H3117>day,<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> them <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you, and you shall <S%H2790>hold<s%> your <S%H2790>peace.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H6817>cry<s%> you to me? <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H5265>go<s%> <S%H5265>forward:<s%>

But <S%H7311>lift<s%> you up your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H1234>divide<s%> it: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> ground <S%H8432>through<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And I, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and they shall <S%H310>follow<s%> them: and I will <S%H3513>get<s%> me <S%H3513>honor<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>host,<s%> on his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and on his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have <S%H7408>gotten<s%> me <S%H3513>honor<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> on his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and on his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> which <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them; and the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5265>went<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> their face, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them:

And it <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and it was a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H2822>darkness<s%> to them, but it gave <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> to these: so that the <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> not <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> caused the <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> back by a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2724>dry<s%> land, and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H1234>divided.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> ground: and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were a <S%H2346>wall<s%> to them on their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and on their <S%H8040>left.<s%>

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> in <S%H310>after<s%> them to the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> to the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> through the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> and of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H2000>troubled<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%>

And <S%H5493>took<s%> off their <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H212>wheels,<s%> that they <S%H5090>drove<s%> them <S%H3517>heavily:<s%> so that the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H5127>flee<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3898>fights<s%> for them against the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5186>Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> may <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> on the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> on their <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and on their <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> forth his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H386>strength<s%> when the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6437>appeared;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> it; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5287>overthrew<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and the <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>host<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; there <S%H7604>remained<s%> not <S%H5704>so<s%> <S%H5704>much<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of them.

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> land in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were a <S%H2346>wall<s%> to them on their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and on their <S%H8040>left.<s%>

Thus the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3027>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> on the <S%H4714>Egyptians:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H539>believed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
